ComicInfo.Title: Heavenly Shades
ComicInfo.Summary:
The series goes monthly with the debut of its new creative team!
An exciting new era for the Wildcats dawns in February's WILDCATS Volume 2 #8 as the book goes monthly, with a new writer-artist team set to amp up the tension and intrigue! Travis Charest stays on board as cover artist, while, between the covers, new writer Joe Casey (X-Men: Children of the Atom, MR. MAJESTIC) is joined by incredibly versatile artist Sean Phillips (HELLBLAZER, Webspinners: Tales of Spider-Man, LEGION OF SUPER-HEROES)! And the first issue features a stunning variant cover by Jim Lee and Scott Williams! (This cover will interlock with the Lee/Williams variant offered for GEN13 #50.)
Writer Joe Casey's long-term plans for the 'Cats include the return of Ladytron (who he recently featured in MR. MAJESTIC #3) as part of the regular cast, along with plans for increased roles for Void and another familiar character whose identity will shock WILDCATS readers. In WILDCATS Volume 2 #8, part 1 of a bold 3-part story, Lord Emp has disappeared! Grifter is convinced that Kenyan is somehow involved, but is the unthinkable true? Has Emp turned traitor? What dark secrets will Cole Cash uncover during his investigation? The answers — and the nonstop action — start coming monthly with WILDCATS Volume 2 #8!
